code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Product}from'../entities/Product';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TestPage=()=>{const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const loadProducts=async()=>{try{console.log('Loading products...');const data=await Product.list();console.log('Products loaded:',data);setProducts(data);}catch(err){console.error('Error loading products:',err);setError(err.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};loadProducts();},[]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Test Page - Loading..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"animate-spin w-8 h-8 border-4 border-emerald-600 border-t-transparent rounded-full"})]});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4 text-red-600",children:"Test Page - Error"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-red-500",children:error})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Test Page - Success!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"mb-4",children:["Products loaded: ",products.length]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid gap-4",children:products.slice(0,3).map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4 border rounded",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"font-bold",children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-stone-600",children:[product.price," DA"]})]},product.id))})]});};export default TestPage;
